sentences: The euro is undoubtedly a success story.
It has contributed to stabilising the international currency system.
In Europe, the former monetary disorder has been replaced by a new monetary order.
The European payment system has become more transparent and price stability is guaranteed.
Switzerland, too, is benefiting from European currency stability.
The Swiss franc is taking advantage of a monetary environment that is considerably calmer than previously.
The euro and the franc are coexisting very successfully.
Nevertheless, it would be wrong to claim that all the effects of European currency integration have already worked their way through to the real economy.
In spurring on competition and promoting transparency, the euro is having an integrating effect.
However, there are still considerable obstacles standing in the way of this integration process.
